metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4400 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
repository/repository_ajax.php in Moodle 2.2.x before 2.2.5 and 2.3.xbefore 2.3.2 allows remote authenticated users to bypass intendedupload-size restrictions via a -1 value in the maxbytes field.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4400` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.2.6.dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.6.dfsg-1').
